name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser Copilot: Unlimited Assistant with ChatGPT, Claude, and Groq!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Context aware AI assistant with unlimited access to GPT-4, Claude 3.5, Llama 3.1. Chat with YouTube videos, PDF files, and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Context-aware chats utilizing all the latest large language models (LLMs) under one subscription.

- Unlimited access to all the latest LLMs like GPT-4, Claude 3.5, Llama 3.1
- Context aware chat
- Private and secure: Only you have access to your data
- Bring your own key: Directly interact with LLMs using your own API keys. No limits, no usage monitoring, no sharing of user data.
- Enhanced Interaction: Enables chats with webpages, PDF files,  YouTube videos, and online data.
- Unlimited YouTube transcription and interaction

Plans:
- Free: 30 Queries per day.
- Pro Plan: Unlimited queries

Free trial:
- 14 days free trial
